summary: This document is a series of suicide watch observation logs and an inmate history report for Jeffrey Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 23-24, 2019. It records observations of Epstein while he was on suicide watch, shortly before his death on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch logs and inmate history report. Listed as being on suicide watch from July 23, 2019, at 0140 to July 24, 2019, at 0845.

events.title: Epstein placed as 'Not Medically Cleared'
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's inmate history shows he was listed as 'Not Medically Cleared' starting on this date.

events.title: Suicide watch begins
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Suicide watch ends
events.description: The documented suicide watch for Jeffrey Epstein concluded at 0845 hours.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York (FCL NYM)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on an official suicide watch from July 23, 2019, at 0140 to July 24, 2019, at 0845.
Epstein's inmate history shows he was listed as 'Not Medically Cleared' starting July 6, 2019.
The document consists of observation logs where guards recorded periodic checks on Epstein's condition, though the specific observations are largely illegible in the provided text.
This log is a critical record of Epstein's status and supervision in the days leading up to his death on August 10, 2019.
